wikipedia_page.main: Paul Geddes (born 19 April 1961 in Paisley) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played in the Football League, as a central defender.

response: In 2017, she left Prudential to join the Direct Line Group as chief financial officer. At the time, she was the only woman on the executive committee of DLG. In May 2019, James succeeded Paul Geddes as CEO of Direct Line Group.
